about_the_game:
A Roguelike with no Game-Overs
Gameplay-focused RPG
Explore the dungeon to find hidden Items

Story


Join Momo on her journey as she explores the Dungeon, dreaming to one day claim fame by defeating The Devil Lord Satan

Gameplay


Venture the depths of the Dungeon by upgrading Stats and collecting new Items

Key Features


Zoom through levels with the game's fast-paced design!
Stress-free gameplay with minimal RPG-like fillers!

No game-overs!
No bulky maps! Each map fits in one screen!
No grinding for levels!
One battle, One click!
No walking NPCs to get in your way!
No item collection command! Goes straight to your inventory!
No Time-limit mechanics!
No limited Items that requires scraping the map!
No chance-based crit mechanics!
Designed for high gameplay mastery !

A Vast Cast of Cute Characters


The game is full of cute characters!
Tons of H scenes too!

Full of unique maps!


Over 200 explorable maps!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, beastiality, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm or suicide, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

Gameplay-focused RPG
Explore the dungeon to find hidden Items

Join Momo on her journey as she explores the Dungeon, dreaming to one day claim fame by defeating The Devil Lord Satan

Gameplay

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Momo's Eternal Adventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7,8,10,11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7,8,10,11
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Roguelike Super in-depth gameplay Tons of game features to master Being defeated leads to cutscenes Battle, Trade, Collect, Destroy… Strategy-heavy game design Full of unique maps! Over 200 explorable maps!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
